entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: ApparentlyStray

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,491Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 9

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Roseâ€™s hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Roseâ€™s mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them. Â  This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.
